page.title: 19Parish Council
page.content: The parish of Potterspury has a {Parish Council}made up of 13 people who are elected by the people of the village. The Council elects a Chairman and has a paid Clerk who takes the minutes of the Council meetings and keeps the accounts and writes letters. The Council is responsible for Street Lighting, play areas, planning, mowing the grass verges and numerous small jobs. They have recently been planting new trees to replace the diseased elm trees. The Council, for the past few years, have distributed bus tokens to the elder residents to help towards the cost of the ever increasing price of bus fares. Another recent project has been the clearing and landscaping of the Cemetery which had fallen into a bad state and was very overgrown and neglected.
